ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Cloud}
“The Turks are
a Shinra organization.
They scout for possible
candidates for SOLDIER.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Aeris}
“This violently? I thought
they were kidnapping
someone.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Cloud}
“But, why're they after you?
There must be a reason,
right?”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Aeris}
“Ha, ha…
They're looking for
me again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“You mean it's not the
first time they've
been after you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Cloud}
“They're also involved in
a lot of other dirty
stuff on the side.”{PAUSE}“Spying,
murder…you know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
“No, not really. I think they
believe I have what it
takes to be in SOLDIER!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“Maybe you do.
You want to join?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Aeris}
“I don't know…
But I don't want to
get caught
by THOSE people!”

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“Ha, ha…
They're looking for
me again.”

{Cloud}
“You mean it's not the
first time they've
been after you?”

{Cloud}
“The Turks are
a Shinra organization.
They scout for possible
candidates for SOLDIER.”

{Aeris}
“This violently? I thought
they were kidnapping
someone.”

{Cloud}
“They're also involved in
a lot of other dirty
stuff on the side.”{PAUSE}“Spying,
murder…you know.”

{Cloud}
“But, why're they after you?
There must be a reason,
right?”

{Aeris}
“No, not really. I think they
believe I have what it
takes to be in SOLDIER!”

{Cloud}
“Maybe you do.
You want to join?”

{Aeris}
“I don't know…
But I don't want to
get caught
by THOSE people!”
